Reviews.Title: “Happy Valley Hampton makes us happy!”
Reviews.Author: LCDude
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel several times because it is near where our daughter lives. Our most recent visit was just perfect. We recommend this hotel highly because of its excellent location, the extremely helpful attitude of the staff, the cleanliness of the rooms, the ease of internet access, and the average, yet plentiful breakfast. The cost is in line (not a bargain, but fair!), and ease of parking make this place just perfect for us. Our only complaint is that we prefer a refrigerator in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient Location”
Reviews.Author: indian1960
Reviews.Content: I stay here whenever I visit Phoenix for business, which is like once every quarter. This hotel is close to the business I visit in Phoenix. Besides, it is just next door to the happy valley shopping area. There are quite a few dining choices in the shopping area. The hotel itself is well maintained with good service from the staff. I am especially impressed with the lady responisble for the breakfast buffet. She makes the buffet different every day and removes the monotony from the buffet. There is nothing extra ordinary about this property. But all the things (which can be very annoying if absent or not working) work fine here. If you need accommodation for a longer stay, I recommend the homewood Suites next door. I would recommend this place who have business to attend in the north phoenix area.

Reviews.Title: “Really good”
Reviews.Author: JJL211
Reviews.Content: After a long day of travel and completely exhausted. I decided to give the Hamptons at Happy Valley a try It's away from the major exit a bit. I had no clue they were so nice. Young professional staff That is skilled at what they do for a change of pace quick to help me get signed in and quick to help with whatever question or help I needed. I give this one a 10 in my opinion I liked that it was close to a number of different stores that are spaced further apart in a up standing location with no problem with walking around. I am from Kansas with no real knowledge of the Phoenix area between the staffs help and location of this area in relation to phoenix metro area there was no place I could not see if I wanted to(A bit of a drive). I like to have a minute or to to process heavy traffic. Bathrooms were nice high end. Breakfast was big and nice snacks were high end. all in all it was a good two nights at a good mid range price. Call before hand and make sure they have rooms. Valerie was the one That helped me she was wonderful I give her a ten.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service and A Very Nice Hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Irishdoc1
Reviews.Content: I had to go to the Glendale area for a business trip and needed to book a hotel. I went through a bunch on tripadvisor and found the Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix North/Happy Valley and I am sure glad that I did. What a wonderful experience from start to finish. I arrived to the hotel early (around 12:30p) and was planning on just hanging out in the lobby with some coffee when I was told by the front desk that they would check on my room. Low and behold it was ready and they checked me in without delay. The hotel and room were very clean, new and fresh and everyone at the hotel was nicer than the next (I did not find one employee who was not smiling or asking if they could do something for me). The free breakfast was very nice and enjoyable with a good variety and they have a mini-coffee bar (self-serve) set-up 24/7 which is great for a coffee drinker like myself. They include free WiFi - which is not only great but saves some money. Nice plasma TVs in the room. Their work-out room was nice and very modern and had good basic offerings. Their outdoor (heated) pool was great (took a nice swim) as was the whirlpool. Another nice feature is that 1/4 mile behind the hotel is a huge outlet of restaurants, stores and pretty much anything you could want or need. The next time I have business or a fun-trip planned for the area I will make sure that I come back to this hotel, I highly recommend without any reservation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Manager, Great Hotel, Great Choice”
Reviews.Author: SunJunky101
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in a great location and was very nice with a modern feel. The manager at the front desk was extremely helpful in assisting us. The free breakfast was very good and the people were very professional. Beautiful rooms, fair price, exercise room, and pool that accommodates little children as well as adults. We were pleasantly surprised at the size of our two queen bed w/sofa bed suite. It was almost the size of two standard hotel rooms. It was huge, very clean and comfortable, with plenty of extra room to store suitcases. We were very impressed with the attention to detail in every aspect of the hotel. Also when the GM talks to you each morning at breakfast to see how you're enjoying your stay, you feel very special. Definitely would stay here again. Excellent!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: borntotrave l
Reviews.Content: I just stayed at this Hampton Inn last month while out visiting my grandmother and loved every minute of it. The rooms were huge and VERY comfortable, loved the beds! There is a great breakfast served every morning in the lobby area that has a ton of different items to chose from, all the food was great. The hotel is located right behind a big shopping with lots of resturants an shops all just a quick walk or drive away. The far and away best part of my stay however was the staff. Every person I saw in uniform was pleasant and greeted us each time we saw them. The front desk was very informative and ready to give recomendations at a moments notice. When I go back out and visit my grandma again I will definitly be back. Thanks for the great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, basic accommodations”
Reviews.Author: Zafss
Reviews.Content: We had a king bed nonsmoking room at this Hampton Inn. The room was comfortable and furnished with a desk, desk chair, easy chair and sofa in addition to a large screen TV and 3-drawer dresser. Its large bathroom had ample counter space and shelves to accommodate our needs. We got lost after exiting route 17 because we did not follow explicit directions to the inn. It is necessary to access the frontage road directly rather than turn onto the exit named street. The front desk staff was helpful in getting us oriented and settling in for a 5-night stay. Some promotional materials located in the business center had expired but were still on display. The exercise room was equipped with free weights and medicine balls in addition to cardio workout machines. There also was a heated outdoor pool and whirlpool available to use. We had a ground floor room and were able to park close by, making it easy to transfer our belongings from the car to and from our room. There was plenty of complimentary parking in the lot. A complimentary breakfast buffet is offered in a large room and anteroom next to the lobby. The variety and quantity are plentiful and are OK for breakfast. Hot drinks are available around the clock. This inn is located within half a mile of the Happy Valley Towne Center and Norterra Shops. The center is anchored by a large Walmart's store. We walked over to the center, did some light shopping, and ate at one of the restaurants while exploring the local conveniences. The staff was friendly, attentive, responsive and helpful There were, however, a number of annoyances indicating lack of attention to detail. • There were no complimentary headphones in the fitness center in the basket provided for them • The wall thermostat was inoperative. After investigation, the housekeeping staff reported having hardware issues with the unit. Fortunately, control was available at the window mounted unit • Safety tips in hotel brochure on our desk recommended placing all valuables in an in-room-safe. There was no safe in the room • We had to log in for Internet access daily every day of our 5-night stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay in Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: Justme00200
Reviews.Content: I picked the Hampton Inn to stay at based on recommendations from colleagues that I work with. I have stayed at many Hampton Inn's in the past and this has to be one of my favorites. From the time I arrived and throughout my stay I was greeted with a smile any time I saw someone. I spent a week at the hotel and it was nice that everyone at the front desk and breakfast even remembered my name. Besides the amazing service, the rooms were immaculate, extremely clean and well maintained. Top it off with a great free breakfast everyday. I would stay here anytime.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: bwt1951
Reviews.Content: This Hampton Inn is relatively new and in walking distance of a huge shopping center in Happy Valley, Phoenix, AZ. I gave it an average rating but would give it a 3.5 out of 5 if possible. The front desk staff were all super friendly from the moment we arrived until we left. No lapses of courtesy from the four different people with whom we interacted. The parking area was well lit and is shared with a Homewood Suites next door. Since our visit was during the Christmas holidays there weren't a lot of people in the inn. We had to call down to the front desk and ask for a light bulb to be put in the floor lamp; there wasn't one in it at all when we arrived. The drain in the bath tub is slow so you end up with a tub about 1/4 full of water after a 5 minute shower. We did NOT ask maintenance to fix the slow drain; it was a minor irritant. The king bed slept great and they had a nice assortment of pillows from which to choose. Interestingly enough, it was cold enough in Phoenix to run the heater during our stay and it worked well with a thermostat on the wall. The room was clean and well maintained. All bathroom amenities were available and in ample supply. They use a reuse/replace system for linens which I prefer. If you put bath linens on the floor, they replace them, else you use them again. Housekeeping was very good. We almost always tip the HK staff and did so this time because of the good service. The breakfast was probably the weakest part of the stay. All the juices were watered down. The sausage patties were good but the links were tasteless. The oatmeal was really thick. Never tried the eggs but they looked 'fake'. Waffles and cold cereal were great and all items were well stocked. Although the food wasn't the best we still tipped the kitchen staff because they did a good job with what they had. Overall, this HI is a nice place to stay but don't expect anything out of the ordinary. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Simple”
Reviews.Author: W0rldW1de
Reviews.Content: Decent, average hotel. Nothing above and beyond, but acceptable for a night or two business stay. If/when in the area again, I would likely stay.

Reviews.Title: “Simple & Nice but...”
Reviews.Author: dancelovah4life
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in good location. Close to some shopping & some restaurants. We only stayed there one night but not that comfortable for me. The A/C was loud that it woke me up at some point. I guess this is common for Hampton Hotels since we seem to have had the same issues in Sedona. If you can sleep with earplugs, then this place won't bother you. The room was clean & the free breakfast was actually good. Assorted juices, breads, coffee, yogurt, some hot food like eggs, etc., good selection for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel & Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: SanTanArizona
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is that I picked the 4th floor for my stay and it is half smoking and half non and the entire floor smells of smoke anyway, I'm not sure every floor is like this though, I may have just picked the stinky floor. Stayed here for 4 days, there is a free breakfast served every morning (muffins, danish, cereal, bagel, toast, juices, fruit and a few hot items, one being waffles. My husband left a little earlier then the time breakfast was served every morning (I think breakfast starts 5:30am) and the staff allowed him to take cold items like juice, pastries, fruit every morning. There is a gym with 1 bike, 2 elipticals, 1 treadmill and weights. The machines have tv's attached to each one. There is a decent pool that is 3ft on the shallow end and 5 ft on the deep end. This is a newer hotel and is right off of the freeway, close to shopping and dining... ate at Mellow Mushroom & Pita Jungle in the area while staying here. Close enough to the big city but just far enough on the outskirt to be able to breath the air. :) Would stay here again if I needed to.

Reviews.Title: “Elegant and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: cathpiano
Reviews.Content: When one travels on business and is staying at a large chain hotel, you know you'll get a good basic experience. This Hampton Inn in Happy Valley is WAY above expecations in all ways. My room was large, lovely, fancy bath (I think it's marble), very comfy bed. Just about anything you could want for breakfast, from the usual cereals and make your own waffles to western style egg burritos, etc. included in the room rate. A clean pool with sun and shade. I was sorry I only got to stay there one night.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: AAtraveler
Reviews.Content: Purchased on Priceline.com got a great deal, check in was easy, and it was off to the room. It was a great room really up there with a 3.5 star so not sure why it hasn't earned that yet. The room was a 2 bedroom suite, with a chair and desk, plus and extra comfy chair. Still plenty of room to move around. Internet was free, and also breakfast, nothing fancy but the usual breakfast, with waffles, fruit, etc. The only downside was the A/C rattled all night, was in a room facing the freeway, but could not hear.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Catch for Visiting Phoenix and surroundings”
Reviews.Author: rowagr
Reviews.Content: The hotel is close to a shopping area and pretty close to the Interstate. However, especially if you have the right room, it is not too noisy. Everything was clean and modern, they have a pool where you actually can swim, friendly staff and good breakfast. Even the gym has some new equipment incl. TV screens on the devices. 5 Minutes away is the Wet'n Wild Park but also Scottsdale and the whole area is easy to reach within minutes. All this comes to a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED LOVED LOVED it!”
Reviews.Author: diamondchampagne
Reviews.Content: I loved my stay at Hampton Inn! The staff was exceptional and very helpful. Cameron and Jordan were very accomadating to my needs. Breakfast was more than I expected and very delicious. Had a great stay and a wonderful visit with my family.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great service, good price.”
Reviews.Author: Macdanone
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights in a king single. Bed was fabulous, slept in and still house keeping came back and cleaned the room spotless! Great breakfast everyday, eggs, waffles etc. VERY Quiet, very clean. Close to a new shopping center and plenty restaurants. I travel a lot for work and Hamptons are always good but this one is just a notch above the rest. Only complaint is that it can be hard to get to, it is on the frontage road off the interstate and at night can hard to see, update your GPS First! If you need to stay in North Phoenix it is great option.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: bakio
Reviews.Content: This is a well-maintained hotel with clean, spacious rooms. Convenient to highway and there is a big shopping mall next door. I appreciate the included wireless access. Self-serve breakfast was good, too. Hot food and healthy choices. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service, Nice Room, Good Location… Walk to shops, movie, restaurants”
Reviews.Author: NorthWoodsWanderer
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last week for a night away from the kids. After looking at several hotels in this vicinity for less on TripAdvisor, all with mixed reviews, we decided to spend a bit more and go for the Hampton. I'm glad we did. Everything was as it should be. We were in a king room with couch. The room was very clean and well-appointed with a desk, sleeper couch (which we didn't use), nice TV (with many channels of course), and good bed with quality bedding. Wireless internet (free) worked well, and I noticed but did not use a wired internet connection also in the room. When I brought back some leftovers from dinner and asked them to keep it for me, they even brought a fridge right up to the room for us. Everyone was consistently friendly and helpful. Loads of shops and larger stores are 1/2 block from the hotel. The hotel sits behind two shopping malls. In addition to a wide variety of stores from boutique stores to WalMart, there are numerous fast food and restaurant options, and a movie theatre about 3 blocks away. Everything is walking distance if you are so inclined. I never realized there was so much at this exit off I-17 before. I believe most of it has been built in the last 3 years or so. Al in all for a relaxing night away everything we needed was very close by and convenient. It was nice not to have to fight the traffic to other commercial areas on Bell, etc. Breakfast was, as free hotel breakfasts go, much above average, with omelettes and sausage in addition to the usual fair of bagels, pastries, cereal, and waffles. There was also fruit, and of course juice and coffee. There was also a nice pool and patio area outside where my wife sat and read for awhile, and a fitness center that we both used (and unlike many hotel fitness centers here everything worked and they even had a full set of dumbbells going up into larger weights). Overall the service was good, everything was clean, and we had a very nice stay. It's not the cheapest, but not overly expensive either. We did get a reduced rate with our AAA card. Would definitely go here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: goldy12345
Reviews.Content: I'm a very picky traveler, and this hotel was a very good experience. The location is extremely accessible to all the north, northwest, and northeast Phoenix suburbs (10-20 minutes away). Glendale and Scottsdale are within a 1/2 hour (depending on which part of the city and time of the day), and the airport is only 1/2 hour drive down I-17 in non-rush hour traffic. This is a newer hotel (approx 2 years). There are a ton of restaurants and some shopping within a couple blocks, but they're all on the back side of the hotel so they are out of sight. Any concerns we had during our stay were handled expeditiously, courteously, and professionally. Great staff. We were there at the height of Spring Training crowds, so it was a very high volume of people. But the staff did a great job attending to any concerns we had. We would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Darnoc
Reviews.Content: Stayed night before Thanksgiving on the way home from Sedona. Very un-busy. Room was great. Everything excellent. Will definitely try this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, comfortable room in good surroundings”
Reviews.Author: erintaylor926
Reviews.Content: Recently I was married and my husband and I chose this hotel as our honeymoon night room. Staff was great working with us and our other guests and were accommodating and helpful. The room was clean with plenty of room, the whole hotel looked clean and up to date and we experienced no problems. I would stay again and recommend to others!

Reviews.Title: “Nice to just get away.”
Reviews.Author: VaBest1
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice place for my friend and I to get away. Spent some quiet time together. Nice breakfast, but like the Homewood Suites Del Mar, the eggs wasn't good and no turkey bacon. Nice visit.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Modern Hampton Great Service”
Reviews.Author: lilow
Reviews.Content: Traveled with my two young children picked this Hampton Inn because it is close to the Happy Valley Town Center with lots of good places to eat and shop with in walking distance. Service was great hotel was very clean and breakfast was super. I was very pleased with how friendly the staff was and how they took interest in my children giving them activity pages for them to color. By far my best experience at the Hampton Inn chain.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: fishgirl_8
Reviews.Content: I had just driven in from Northern California so I was exhausted. When inquiring about price I was shocked as to how cheap a room for me and my family was. The room was in great condition as the hotel is new. There was a nice big flat screen television, clean linens, spotless bathroom and the room was a pleasant temperature. I heard no noise from our neighbors so I assume the walls are built well. Their pool outside looked refreshing but I had forgot my swimsuit so I couldn't enjoy it. Breakfast had hot and cold items, all very tasty. I took a business card on my way out because I wanted to know where I was coming back to. I'm planning an escape from Colorado this winter and have every intention of staying at this hotel again. Great service, great rooms, and you can't beat the price. A ++

Reviews.Title: “New hotel, OK”
Reviews.Author: mojave
Reviews.Content: The hotel is new. Staff is pleasant, breakfast is fine but not outstanding. I had booked nine nights, but left after two, because the windows are sealed and I like to sleep with an open window. A few things were irritating, such as a bad fax number on the web site. No fridge or microwave in the room. Expensive for what it is.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix North / Happy Valley
HotelInfo.Address: 2550 West Charlotte Drive, Phoenix, AZ 85085
